name: FlutterAssetAutoCompletion
description:
Automatically help you complete the path of assets when you type a Dart string

Register assets to pubspec with one click!

  • The "assets:" definition needs to be included in the pubspec

Support preview of multiple image formats such as png, svg, jpg, gif and more

Support for assets declared in pubspec.yaml

  • normal assets like:

    assets:
      - path/to/assets_directory
      - path/to/image.png
  • assets in "lib" directory like:

    assets:
      - image.png
  • assets declared in pubspec.yaml of other packages
  • assets in lib/ of other packages and declared in pubspec.yaml of current package like:

    assets:
      - packages/fancy_images_lib/image.png

Support for fonts

  • fonts declared in pubspec.yaml of other packages
  • normal fonts declared in pubspec.yaml like:

    fonts:
      - family: Andale Mono
        fonts:
          - asset: fonts/Andale Mono.ttf
  • iOS pre-installed fonts
IOS_9_FONT_LIST:
          "PingFang HK",

Submit Issues
notes:
1.7.7

  • Adapt Idea 222 version
  • Update 'org.jetbrains.intellij' to 1.9.0

1.7.6

  • Adapt Idea 213 version

1.7.5

  • bugfix: Sync Assets in sub-project

1.7.4

  • bugfix

1.7.3

  • bugfix

1.7.0

  • Register assets to pubspec with one click

1.6.0

  • Compatible with Android Studio 4.1

1.5.4

  • We will not process strings in import statements

1.5.3

  • bugfix: assets in lib/ of other packages and declared in pubspec.yaml of current package

1.5.2

  • Support to complete the fonts in the sub-packages listed in the '.package' file

1.5.1

  • change issue tracker

1.5.0

  • Support to complete the assets in the sub-packages listed in the '.package' file

1.4.4

  • bugfix

1.4.3

  • Improve performance

1.4.2

  • Autocompleted assets will only replace the string before the cursor

1.4.1

  • Add Android and iOS pre-installed fonts as default candidates

1.4.0

  • supports fonts

1.3.0

  • supports svg file preview

1.2.3

  • support Android Studio from 191 to 193

1.2.2

  • support Android Studio 192

1.2.1

  • fix bug: lookup string is lowercase

1.2.0

  • supports asset preview

1.1.4

  • supports assets in lib/. (note: you must config their name in pubspec asset section, e.g. "assets: - test.png" )
  • supports assets in dependencies. (note: you must config their name in pubspec asset section, e.g. "assets: - packages/fancy_images/image_1.png", here a package named fancy_image have image_1.png )

1.1.3

  • filter null asset path. (e.g. "assets: - ")
  • add logo

1.1.2

  • fix bug: no completion when pubspec contains multilevel directory path. (e.g. "- assets/images/")
  • fix bug: completion path is full path instead of relative path if pubspec contains full file path.

1.1.1

  • add log

1.0

  • Suggest asset paths when you type a Dart string
